Text: Just like u can't speed up phone calls by amassing phone books (Directories), similarly u can't speed up ator by amassing Trackers.. I just don't know how even experienced TPB users can be so GULLIBLE...

@kyajibhai2           

While is is true that adding more trackers doesn't speed up downloads, it does help for dead/dying torrents by providing more 'phone books' (Directories) to search from and find more seeders
